title: Everyone in oce
body: get onto 3s ranked so we can make it a perma game

replies.body:
Yesir!

Im at my friends place, theres 3 of us, we all have mega lag, and we shall be 3v3ing as long as we can!
same here my friend :D lan party!
Wish I could but I only got home from biking just before I had to cook. Will do so next week!

Ranked 3s all night ;)

Have you found any particular team comp that works for you?

Rn im 50/50 between:
 a jungler, a bruiser and an AP
and an AP support (karma/lux/lulu), long range adc, and a bruiser.

Hahah the enemy wouldn't know what hit em. 

Just got absolutely crushed by a Poppy, Vi, Swain. 
Poppy seems so strong with all the walls to E into.

Ikr xD

ohh true that, i suppose vayne might be just as lethal
and if you lack mechanics, the pick power warwick, nautilus or veigar offers in the close packed but low number map that is twisted tree line is extremely effective.
I usually just run all fighters and ap people that do work with minimal items. Once you get those first advantages in TT its pretty mutch game over.
i reckon ad with aptank and tank or two tanks with ap or 3 tanks ;)
3 assassins. It worked well in the 3v3 norms!
